name: Park View Village Apartments

google_reviews.author: Anna Maag
google_reviews.review: We loved living here! Cheryl and Alex are absolutely amazing! Very accommodating and fast with responses! The apartment complex itself, are very clean and professional. Units look brand new with nice appliances inside. We will miss it here!

google_reviews.author: Katelyn
google_reviews.review: We moved into the Park View Village Apartments sight unseen and Cheryl the property manager was so helpful and easy to communicate with.  She sent us videos of multiple units for us to choose between to best suit our needs prior to making our final decision.  She is by far the best property manager we've had the pleasure of leasing from.  Would recommend the property to others as not only are the apartment and community amenities great so is the management and service.   Cheryl and Alex are very responsive to work orders and get requests handled in a timely manner.  The apartment has a trail right behind it that leads to a park, which is great if you have pets or enjoy being outdoors.  If you are looking for an apartment to lease then look no further this is the spot for you.

google_reviews.author: Maddy Guilbaud
google_reviews.review: I really love this place! Cheryl the property manager is such a sweetheart who is the cherry on top of everything else great about living here. Alex is super quick and friendly when we put in work orders. The whole complex is quiet and friendly. We are close enough to everything to still feel like we live in town while being more secluded. 1000/10 recommendation if your looking at living here.

google_reviews.author: Esther Kukhahn
google_reviews.review: Very pretty place. It's has sucurd front doors ( you have to be buzzed in by someone that lives there or have your own key to unlock the doors)  once inside you come to find yourself in a upscale lobbie with very pleasant decorations and different seating options and arraignments.

google_reviews.author: Erik Bracht
google_reviews.review: The grounds are beautiful. The staff,  friendly and helpful. The move-in carts made available were priceless and the move-in condition of the apartment was excellent.

google_reviews.author: Doug Munger
google_reviews.review: Well maintained building and property manager stayed on top of everything while we lived there. We had no issues that weren't taken care of quickly and done right first time.

google_reviews.author: Xavier Van Diest
google_reviews.review: Apartment is lovely, and the process of getting into it was easy and stress free!

google_reviews.author: Daniel Fernandez
google_reviews.review: My friend lives here. Great neighborhood.

google_reviews.author: Payton Skoglund
google_reviews.review: Loved living here and was so thankful for the amazing management!
